verses.verse: Woe <WH480> is me! for I am as when they have gathered <WH625> the summer fruits <WH7019>, as the grapegleanings <WH5955> of the vintage <WH1210>: there is no cluster <WH811> to eat <WH398> <WH8800>: my soul <WH5315> desired <WH183> <WH8765> the firstripe fruit <WH1063>.

The good <WH2623> man is perished <WH6> <WH8804> out of the earth <WH776>: and there is none upright <WH3477> among men <WH120>: they all lie in wait <WH693> <WH8799> for blood <WH1818>; they hunt <WH6679> <WH8799> every man <WH376> his brother <WH251> with a net <WH2764>.

That they may do evil <WH7451> with both hands <WH3709> earnestly <WH3190> <WH8687>, the prince <WH8269> asketh <WH7592> <WH8802>, and the judge <WH8199> <WH8802> asketh for a reward <WH7966>; and the great <WH1419> man, he uttereth <WH1696> <WH8802> his mischievous <WH1942> desire <WH5315>: so they wrap it up <WH5686> <WH8762>.

The best <WH2896> of them is as a brier <WH2312>: the most upright <WH3477> is sharper than a tshofar hedge <WH4534>: the day <WH3117> of thy watchmen <WH6822> <WH8764> and thy visitation <WH6486> cometh <WH935> <WH8804>; now shall be their perplexity <WH3998>.

Trust <WH539> <WH8686> ye not in a friend <WH7453>, put ye not confidence <WH982> <WH8799> in a guide <WH441>: keep <WH8104> <WH8798> the doors <WH6607> of thy mouth <WH6310> from her that lieth <WH7901> <WH8802> in thy bosom <WH2436>.

For the son <WH1121> dishonoureth <WH5034> <WH8764> the father <WH1>, the daughter <WH1323> riseht up <WH6965> <WH8801> against her mother <WH517>, the daughter in Torah <WH3618> against her mother in Torah <WH2545>; a man's <WH376> enemies <WH341> <WH8802> are the men <WH582> of his own house <WH1004>.
Therefore I will look <WH6822> <WH8762> unto the YY <WH3068>; I will wait <WH3176> <WH8686> for the 'Elohim <WH430> of my salvation <WH3468>: my 'Elohim <WH430> will hear <WH8085> <WH8799> me.

Rejoice <WH8055> <WH8799> not against me, O mine enemy <WH341> <WH8802>: when I fall <WH5307> <WH8804>, I shall arise <WH6965> <WH8804>; when I sit <WH3427> <WH8799> in darkness <WH2822>, the YY <WH3068> shall be a light <WH216> unto me.

I will bear <WH5375> <WH8799> the indignation <WH2197> of the YY <WH3068>, because I have sinned <WH2398> <WH8804> against him, until he plead <WH7378> <WH8799> my cause <WH7379>, and execute <WH6213> <WH8804> judgment <WH4941> for me: he will bring me forth <WH3318> <WH8686> to the light <WH216>, and I shall behold <WH7200> <WH8799> his righteousness <WH6666>.

Then she that is mine enemy <WH341> <WH8802> shall see <WH7200> <WH8799> it, and shame <WH955> shall cover <WH3680> <WH8762> her which said <WH559> <WH8802> unto me, Where is the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430>? mine eyes <WH5869> shall behold <WH7200> <WH8799> her: now shall she be trodden down <WH4823> as the mire <WH2916> of the streets <WH2351>.
In the day <WH3117> that thy walls <WH1447> are to be built <WH1129> <WH8800>, in that day <WH3117> shall the decree <WH2706> be far removed <WH7368> <WH8799>.

In that day <WH3117> also he shall come <WH935> <WH8799> even to thee from Ashur <WH804>, and from the fortified <WH4693> cities <WH5892>, and from the fortress <WH4693> even to the river <WH5104>, and from sea <WH3220> to sea <WH3220>, and from mountain <WH2022> to mountain <WH2022>.
Notwithstanding the land <WH776> shall be desolate <WH8077> because of them that dwell <WH3427> <WH8802> therein, for the fruit <WH6529> of their doings <WH4611>.

Feed <WH7462> <WH8798> thy people <WH5971> with thy rod <WH7626>, the flock <WH6629> of thine heritage <WH5159>, which dwell <WH7931> <WH8802> solitarily <WH910> in the wood <WH3293>, in the midst <WH8432> of Karmel <WH3760>: let them feed <WH7462> <WH8799> in Bashan <WH1316> and Gil`ad <WH1568>, as in the days <WH3117> of old <WH5769>.
According to the days <WH3117> of thy coming <WH3318> <WH8800> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> will I shew <WH7200> <WH8686> unto him marvellous <WH6381> <WH8737> things.

The nations <WH1471> shall see <WH7200> <WH8799> and be confounded <WH954> <WH8799> at all their might <WH1369>: they shall lay <WH7760> <WH8799> their hand <WH3027> upon their mouth <WH6310>, their ears <WH241> shall be deaf <WH2790> <WH8799>.

They shall lick <WH3897> <WH8762> the dust <WH6083> like a serpent <WH5175>, they shall move <WH7264> <WH8799> out of their holes <WH4526> like worms <WH2119> <WH8801> of the earth <WH776>: they shall be afraid <WH6342> <WH8799> of the YY <WH3068> our 'Elohim <WH430>, and shall fear <WH3372> <WH8799> because of thee.

Who is a 'Elohim <WH410> like unto thee, that pardoneth <WH5375> <WH8802> iniquity <WH5771>, and passeht by <WH5674> <WH8802> the transgression <WH6588> of the remnant <WH7611> of his heritage <WH5159>? he retaineth <WH2388> <WH8689> not his anger <WH639> for ever <WH5703>, because he delighteth <WH2654> <WH8804> in mercy <WH2617>.

He will turn again <WH7725> <WH8799>, he will have compassion <WH7355> <WH8762> upon us; he will subdue <WH3533> <WH8799> our iniquities <WH5771>; and thou wilt cast <WH7993> <WH8686> all their sins <WH2403> into the depths <WH4688> of the sea <WH3220>.

Thou wilt perform <WH5414> <WH8799> the truth <WH571> to Ya`akov <WH3290>, and the mercy <WH2617> to Avraham <WH85>, which thou hast sworn <WH7650> <WH8738> unto our fathers <WH1> from the days <WH3117> of old <WH6924>.
